summary: Eingeth the writer is a pacifist who will hold your equipment and follow you
descriptionHtml:
For those people who want a follower that doesnt leech there exp and will flee without the enemies taking notice of him, If they somehow do he is set to essential and has 1 health point so will go down quickly before any crazy chasing should happen. The npc is located at the sleeping giant inn in riverwood.

Even though i have magically set the npcs sneak to an unimaginable level, the enemies do pay attention to the pacifist if you hide after a
fight from what ive seen so far, So sneakers keep that inmind. Hiding before a fight seems perfect as the pacifist doesnt seem to alert anyone.

Added Rosealine as an optional this is replacement for main so dont use both at once.


Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27473/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D27473&pUp=1]Followers No Longer Have Hunting Bow by [b]mrjentipede[/b][/url]
author: thelawfull
